codeSystems.name: AntimicrobialResistanceVS
codeSystems.title: Antimicrobial Resistance ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Comprehensive value set for antimicrobial resistance testing including drugs, antibiotics, susceptibility results, and resistance patterns

codeSystems.name: HGVSVS
codeSystems.title: Human Genome Variation Society (HGVS) Nomenclature
codeSystems.description: HGVS-nomenclature is used to report and exchange information regarding variants found in DNA, RNA and protein sequences and serves as an international standard. (source: varnomen.hgvs.org)

codeSystems.name: TBDCodesVS
codeSystems.title: To Be Determined Value Set
codeSystems.description: Value Set for codes yet to be defined in LOINC
